alert.note: Alert for Goodhue (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 9:05AM CST until January 09 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...In Minnesota, Goodhue County. In Wisconsin, Pepin and Eau Claire Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
